name: Colas Dark Blocket.se
additional_info:
Since there were no working dark style for Blocket.se I made one. Intended to be more relaxing at night.

No ads removed, I use uBlock Origin addon for that. You should too if you want them gone. I also use noscript addon to filter out garbage. This style seems to work fine even without these addons.

Primary focus is on Alla annonser, but Bostad should work ok too. Jobb does not work ok, dunno if I'll fix it.

2016-06-03 Darkened the giant white Jobb add at the bottom. Also did some quick darken of the Jobb pages. Not perfect, but should be usable.
2016-04-18 Made white ad space background transparent, it was visible even with adblocker when testing on Chrome. Added section to remove most ads, but it's disabled by default. To activate, remove /* and */ around it. Changed page number colors on Bostad. Changed dates in this changelog to realign with reality.
2016-04-17 Fixed visited link color. Changed line colors. A lot of other smaller adjustments to make it look better. (screenshot is updated)
2016-04-16 Beta version, uploading for backup. Still usable, but adjustments will probably happen.
